channel.title: Need help with my client
channel.description:
ok i am having trouble with my client. its not connecting to my source. it says
C:\users\skyler\desktop\knrdlscape client V1\knrdlscape client>quote: 'quote:' is not recongnized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.

item.title: Need help with my client
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“Kaizee, post:2, topic:397272”][quote author=s3xypkz link=topic=494422.msg3614501#msg3614501 date=1306867394]
ok i am having trouble with my client. its not connecting to my source. it says

C:\users\skyler\desktop\knrdlscape client V1\knrdlscape client>quote: ‘quote:’ is not recongnized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
[/quote]

The client doesnt connect to the source it connects to your IP Address (Maybe the on the you created on No-IP?), double check over that you have set your client’s connection IP correctly to your IP Address.[/quote]
or just set it to local host (0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1)
also make shure the file names in the bat file are exactly what u have as your client files, if the name is something different from knrdlscape client V1\knrdlscape client then it wont work.

Read full topic

C:\users\skyler\desktop\knrdlscape client V1\knrdlscape client>quote: ‘quote:’ is not recongnized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.[/quote]

The client doesnt connect to the source it connects to your IP Address (Maybe the on the you created on No-IP?), double check over that you have set your client’s connection IP correctly to your IP Address.
